name: Calendar Text Reminders
description: Module scrapes calendar to send reminder texts for upcoming appointments

crons.cron_description: Cron that runs hourly to send emails a prefix amount in advance

project-settings.name:
Enter the hour that you want to send the email. Enter just the hour (in 24 hour format)
Enter 12 for noon,13 for 1pm etc.
Field that holds the phone number to text
Field to check for inactive status

Enter the triggering prefix in the calendar note to signal a text is to be sent.
Only text prepended with this text on the first line of the calendar will be sent.

Event group
Group of events on which to apply set of rules

sub_settings.name:
Event List
List of event names on which to apply these set of rules.
For example:
baseline_arm_1
event_1_arm_1

If applying to all events, leave empty.
If applying to 'AdHoc' event, enter 'adhoc'

Text Message
Enter the text message you want sent for this event group.
[topline] reports the first line of the Calendar note
[date] reports the Calendar date
[time] reports the Calendar time

Date offset
How many days prior to date found in calendar should the text reminder be sent?

project-settings.name:
Reply texts
Specify the response to reply texts

sub_settings.name:
Allowed replies from the user
For example, 'C' to indicate confirmation or 'R' to request reschedule.

Reply to incoming
If the previous text is received, what to reply. For example, 'Your confirmation has been received.' or 'Please call 415-555-1212 to reschedule.'
